languages.text: {n}Когитатор сначала вредничает, делая вид, что не распознает ваш запрос, но с пятой попытки сжаливается. Напарником Орто был старший трубовед Гведон, СТ-268-55, на вахту со дня происшествия не заступал.{/n}

{n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когитатор сначала вредничает, делая вид, что не распознает ваш запрос, но с пятой попытки сжаливается. Напарником Орто был старший трубовед Гведон, СТ-268-55, на вахту со дня происшествия не заступал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At first the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

{n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au début, le cogitateur fait semblant de ne pas comprendre votre requête et feint l'ignorance pour le seul plaisir de vous contrarier, mais au bout de quatre tentatives supplémentaires, l'esprit finit par avoir pitié de vous. Le partenaire d'Orto est un égoutier de grade supérieur appelé Gwedon dont le matricule est ES-268-55 et il n'a plus donné signe de vie depuis l'incident.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au début, le cogitateur fait semblant de ne pas comprendre votre requête et feint l'ignorance pour le seul plaisir de vous contrarier, mais au bout de quatre tentatives supplémentaires, l'esprit finit par avoir pitié de vous. Le partenaire d'Orto est un égoutier de grade supérieur appelé Gwedon dont le matricule est ES-268-55 et il n'a plus donné signe de vie depuis l'incident.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al principio, el cogitador finge ignorarte por pura inquina, haciendo como si no reconociera tu solicitud, pero, después de cuatro intentos más, el espíritu tiene piedad de ti. El compañero de Orto era el inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon, número SP-268-55. No se ha presentado en su puesto desde el incidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al principio, el cogitador finge ignorarte por pura inquina, haciendo como si no reconociera tu solicitud, pero, después de cuatro intentos más, el espíritu tiene piedad de ti. El compañero de Orto era el inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon, número SP-268-55. No se ha presentado en su puesto desde el incidente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一开始，机魂出于恶意假装没听懂你的请求，或是假装没有意识到你的请求，但在你连续询问了四次之后，机魂终于软化下来。奥托的工友是高阶管道员戈登，编号是SP-268-55。自从事故发生之后，戈登就再也没有出现在岗位上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一开始，机魂出于恶意假装没听懂你的请求，或是假装没有意识到你的请求，但在你连续询问了四次之后，机魂终于软化下来。奥托的工友是高阶管道员戈登，编号是SP-268-55。自从事故发生之后，戈登就再也没有出现在岗位上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}最初に、コジテーターは腹いせに無知を装い、あなたの要求に気づかないふりをした。だが数回後、精霊はあなたを憐れんだ。オルトのパートナーは上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンで、番号はSP-268-55。グウェドンは事件以来、出勤していない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最初に、コジテーターは腹いせに無知を装い、あなたの要求に気づかないふりをした。だが数回後、精霊はあなたを憐れんだ。オルトのパートナーは上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンで、番号はSP-268-55。グウェドンは事件以来、出勤していない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zunächst gibt sich der Cogitator aus purer Gehässigkeit unwissend und gibt vor, deine Anfrage nicht zu erkennen. Nach vier weiteren Versuchen hat er jedoch Mitleid mit dir. Ortos Partner war der leitende Rohrhüter Gwedon, Nummer LR-268-55. Gwedon hat sich seit dem Zwischenfall nicht mehr zum Dienst gemeldet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zunächst gibt sich der Cogitator aus purer Gehässigkeit unwissend und gibt vor, deine Anfrage nicht zu erkennen. Nach vier weiteren Versuchen hat er jedoch Mitleid mit dir. Ortos Partner war der leitende Rohrhüter Gwedon, Nummer LR-268-55. Gwedon hat sich seit dem Zwischenfall nicht mehr zum Dienst gemeldet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayar, hıncından dolayı en başta bilmiyormuş numarası yapıyor. Talebini anlamaz gibi davransa da dört kez daha denemenin ardından ruh sana acımaya başlıyor. Orto'nun ortağı, KHM-268-55 numarasına sahip kıdemli hat muhafızı Gwedon. Gwedon, vukuattan bu yana görev başına dönmemiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first, the cogitator feigns ignorance out of spite, pretending not to recognise your request, but, after four more attempts, the spirit takes pity on you. Orto's partner was senior pipewarden Gwedon, number SP-268-55. Gwedon has not reported for duty since the incident.{/n}
